short_description_localized.en: Grand Suites reflect the sumptuous interiors of Manhattan’s Upper East Side residences.
short_description_localized.es: Grand Suites reflect the sumptuous interiors of Manhattan’s Upper East Side residences.

description_localized.en: Grand Suites reflect the sumptuous interiors of Manhattan’s Upper East Side residences.  Delicate couture touches speak to The Pierre’s iconic heritage, while regal furnishings pay discreet homage to the royal Taj tradition. Each Grand Suite is individually designed to offer an exclusive, tranquil retreat amidst Manhattan’s vibrant avenues. An elegant dining area in each suite is perfect for hosting intimate gatherings and private meals. Grand Suites are available with one to four bedrooms and range in size from 1,300 to 2,000 square feet, or 121 to 186 square meters. Located throughout the hotel, Grand Suites feature lofty ceilings, soaking tubs, and captivating views of the Manhattan skyline. In addition to pantry kitchens and finely appointed living rooms.
description_localized.es: Grand Suites reflect the sumptuous interiors of Manhattan’s Upper East Side residences.  Delicate couture touches speak to The Pierre’s iconic heritage, while regal furnishings pay discreet homage to the royal Taj tradition. Each Grand Suite is individually designed to offer an exclusive, tranquil retreat amidst Manhattan’s vibrant avenues. An elegant dining area in each suite is perfect for hosting intimate gatherings and private meals. Grand Suites are available with one to four bedrooms and range in size from 1,300 to 2,000 square feet, or 121 to 186 square meters. Located throughout the hotel, Grand Suites feature lofty ceilings, soaking tubs, and captivating views of the Manhattan skyline. In addition to pantry kitchens and finely appointed living rooms.

images.name: Two-Bedroom-Deluxe-Grand-Suite-Living-Room
images.caption: Living Room
images.alt:
The two-bedroom Grand Suites feature decor that reflects The Pierre’s iconic heritage and offers stunning views of Central Park. An impressive entry foyer complements the elegant living room that features regal furnishings. A comfortable sofa, coffee table and two exquisitely upholstered arm chairs. An executive desk with chair sits across a wall mounted 40” TV hangs over the vanity fireplace with console and mini bar.  The space includes a four-seater dining table.  The grand suite is complimented by a well-appointed pantry kitchen for private gatherings.
The suites comprise of two bedrooms – the master bedroom features a plush and comfortable king bed, chaise, two night stands with Bose Wave Studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock. An executive writing desk and chair is located opposite the bed, a, 40” TV and console is located on the far side of the room. 
The second bedroom comprises of twin beds, one night stands between the two beds and console with a 40” TV. Four fixture Turkish marble clad bathrooms features a pedestal sink, glass enclosed shower, bathtub, plush bathrobes and towels and luxurious Etro amenities.
